casebody.data:
On joint motion to vacate judgment and remand filed July 13, reversed and remanded September 26, 2007 Betty J. KIRK and Darrell Kirk, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. MAPLETON SCHOOL DISTRICT #32, an Oregon education district, Defendant-Respondent.

Lane County Circuit Court

160601536; A133606 168 P3d 1237 Charles Duncan and Janet Schroer for motion. Before Wollheim, Presiding Judge, and Schuman and Rosenblum, Judges. PER CURIAM

Reversed and remanded. Baker v. City of Lakeside, 343 Or 70, 164 P3d 259 (2007).
